developer-centric opinionated part the

developers to achieve the goals more

by arranging it so that they don't have
to be constantly waiting for other
people to be able to get things done
the developer-centric part is about
allowing the develop developers to
achieve their goals more easily by
providing them with configuration tools
that are using a set of semantics that
make sense to an application developer
the opinionated part is about trying to
provide straightforward mechanisms that
make a lot of sense as opposed to
mechanisms that can accomplish
absolutely everything but are
